dictionary.title: process

entry.name: ‎air-dried density‎
entry.description: measurement unit of the density of timber which has been air-dried

entry.name: ‎distillation‎
entry.description: method of separating mixtures based on differences in volatility of components in a boiling liquid mixture

entry.name: ‎Discountinuous lung sounds and hysteresis in control and Tween 20-rinsed excised rat lungs.‎
‎liquid–liquid extraction‎
entry.description: method to separate compounds based on their relative solubilities in two different immiscible liquids, usually water and an organic solvent; extraction of a substance from one liquid into another liquid phase
